import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Table, Button, Pagination, PaginationLink, PaginationItem } from "reactstrap"; export default class ProductList extends Component { state = { page: 1, pageSize: 10 }; nextPage = () => { if (this.state.page <= Math.ceil(this.props.products.length / this.state.pageSize)) { this.setState({ page: this.state.page + 1 }); } }; render() { return ( <>

{this.props.title} - {this.props.currentCategory}

{ this.props.products.map((product) => ( )) }
# Product Name Category Price Quantity
{product.id} {product.name} {product.category} {product.price} {product.quantity} this.props.AddtoCart(product.name)}>
1 2 ) } }
